sourceMeaningMnemonic: Somebody got <radical>dirt</radical> on your <radical>fingers</radical> and <radical>dirt</radical> on your <radical>toe</radical>s so you're going to <kanji>hang</kanji> them upside-down and slap them with your dirty extremities.
meaningInfo: If someone got dirt all up in your finger and toe business wouldn't you want to hang them too?
readingMnemonic: You have this person <kanji>hang</kanji>ing upside-down but they don't seem to be suffering enough, so you hit them with your <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). No mercy.
readingInfo: Don't get dirt on me, buddy. Or I'll hang you upside-down and hit you with my car. Then you'll be sorry.
